name: Shiftry
author: Uta
flavor_text: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.

abilities.name: Shifty Substitution
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, each Supporter card in your opponent’s hand has the effect “Draw 3 cards.” (This happens instead of the card’s usual effect.)

attacks.name: Fan Tornado
attacks.effect: You may have your opponent switch their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.
